title: Side Effects of Redefining the Wine Industry (with Ingrid Best)
description:
This week we pour into the marketing mind of Ingrid Best, former Diageo exec and now founder of iBest Wines.
~
For more content, subscribe to our Patreon (patreon.com/smartfunnyandblack)!
~
Hurry and enter TODAY for your chance to win the Lake Tahoe Dream House or other life-changing prizes and experiences at omaze.com/doses. Plus, receive 20 extra entries when you enter code doses 20.
Right now, Fuzzy is offering our listeners a FREE 7-Day Trial membership. Go to YourFuzzy.com/doses today to sign up.
It’s time to reclaim your health and arm your immune system with convenient, daily nutrition. Get a free 1 year supply of immune-supporting Vitamin D and 5 free travel packs with your first purchase. All you have to do is visit athleticgreens.com/doses.
Find Lumineux on Amazon.com and get seven dollars off today!
